title: We Like The Trend 2/18: GameStop, Meek Mill, Steph, Mars, Demi Lovato, Gender Pay Gap
itunes:title: We Like The Trend 2/18: GameStop, Meek Mill, Steph, Mars, Demi Lovato, Gender Pay Gap
description:
On this edition of We Like The Trend Reddit user u/DeepFuckingValue is in a Senatorial hearing, Meek Mill has a tasteless rap line, Steph Curry is on video game God Mode, Perseverance has successfully landed on Mars, Demi Lovato reveals details about her near overdose in 2018, and the Gender pay gap in Medicine is one the greatest in any industry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
